questions.full_question_text: The trend in airplane hull-loss rate over the last three decades seems to be related to:
Runway friction coefficient 0.20 means estimated surface friction:
Alternate yellow/green centre line lights of a taxiway indicate:
If you see red light of the aircraft ahead at 2 o'clock, it means:
options: Safe. The aircraft is flying away from you
Safe. The aircraft is moving from left to right
Unsafe. The aircraft is moving from right to left
questions.solution: Unsafe. The aircraft is moving from right to left

questions.full_question_text: Series of red and green projection fired at an interval of 10 secs means:
options: Do not land for the time being.

questions.full_question_text: FIS (Flight Information Service) gives collision hazard warnings in:

options: A VFR procedure to enable an aeroplane to transit a control zone or area in IMC without compliance with IFR
Any flight cleared by ATC to operate in conditions less than VMC in which the pilot is required to remain clear of cloud and in sight of the surface
A VFR flight cleared by ATC to operate within a CTR in meteorological conditions below VMC
questions.solution: A VFR flight cleared by ATC to operate within a CTR in meteorological conditions below VMC
